parameters.content:
## Contabo Backups Workflow
This workflow will automatically backup (snapshot) your VPS's hosted on Contabo every day at midnight.

### Setup
Open **Credential** and update the values â€‹â€‹below

- **CLIENT_ID**
- **CLIENT_SECRET**
- **API_USER**
- **API_PASSWORD**

You will find this information in the [Customer Control Panel.]({{ $env.API_BASE_URL }}

Workflow created by [Marcos Antonio]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}
[Linkedin]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}
[GitHub]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡·

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Set Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Set Workflow. This workflow integrates 10 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, scheduleTrigger, splitOut, merge. It contains 53 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 53
- **Node Types**: 10
- **Error Handling**: âœ… Implemented
- **Security**: âœ… Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: âœ… Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Set snapshot attributes**: set
- **Schedule Trigger**: scheduleTrigger
- **When clicking â€˜Test workflowâ€™**: manualTrigger
- **Credential**: set
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Authorization**: httpRequest
- **List instances**: httpRequest
- **Split Out**: splitOut
- **UUID**: httpRequest
- **TRACE ID**: httpRequest
- ... and 43 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
